application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: G2 1x Common Hazel - Prune back to kerb edge, and away from parking bays for vehicle clearance and to prevent nuisance/obstructionT3 1x Silver Birch - Fell (dead tree which is exempt).T5 1x Silver Birch - Fell (dead tree which is exempt).T6 1x Field Maple - Crown raise to 2.5m. Low hanging branches over parking bays for vehicle clearance and to prevent nuisance/obstructionT7 1x Field Maple - Crown raise to 2.5. Low hanging branches over parking bays for vehicle clearance and to prevent nuisance/obstructionT8 1x Common Beech - Reduce height to the hedge height and maintain as hedge in futureT10 1x Cockspur Thorn - Crown lift to 2.5m above ground level for pedestrian clearanceT11 1x Ash - Fell (dead tree)T12 1x Apple - Prune back from building to give 1m clearance to abate nuisance and prevent potential damage.T13 1x Tree of Heaven - Fell sucker root growth from adjacent mature treeT14 1x Tree of Heaven - Fell sucker root growth from adjacent mature treeT15 1x Tree of Heaven - Fell sucker root growth from adjacent mature treeT16 1x Wild Cherry - Fell - specimen in decline and poor conditionT17 1x Cherry - Crown raise to 2.5m and prune back from building for 1m clearance.T18 1x Cherry - Fell specimen in decline and poor conditionT19 1x Silver Birch dead treeAll works to be compliant with BS3998:2010Replacement planting for T3, T5, T17 and T18 - same species in adjacent locationT13,14,15 not to be replaced as sucker root growth
site_name: Aspen House10 Forest RoadKewRichmondTW9 3BY
